description:
Your real-time scores and stats app, fast and simple.

• As fast as a sports app can be. Get updates in real time with Live Activities on your Lock Screen or on match pages with odds, scores, play-by-play and more.
• Follow teams, leagues, divisions and tournaments, and personalise your home view in the app.
• Add a widget to your Home Screen to get quick access to scores and upcoming schedules.
• The best place to be a fan. Watch live matches on Apple TV or catch up on breaking stories with Apple News when you sync your sports.
• Includes Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2, Champions League, Conference League, EFL Championship, EFL Cup, Europa League, F1, FA Cup, FBS and FCS NCAA College Football, LaLiga, Leagues Cup, LIGA MX, Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Men’s College Basketball, Men’s Tennis, MLB, MLS, NASCAR, NBA, NFL, NHL, NWSL, Primeira Liga, Premier League, Segunda División, Serie A, Serie B, WNBA, Women’s Champions League, Women’s College Basketball and Women’s Tennis.

Requirements:
• Availability and features may vary by country, region or device.
• Apple Sports is free to use and is available for all iPhone models using iOS 17.2 or later.
• Features require internet access over a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection.

MultiSport is now digital!

*Please note that this app is in its early stages. You may encounter temporary issues while visiting facilities and registering visits digitally. If this occurs, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Additionally, once you activate your virtual card, your plastic MultiSport card will no longer be valid.

Switch to a virtual card within the app and use a QR code for check-ins at sports facilities.

Here's how:
1. Create a profile on MyMultiSport, or if you're already registered, simply log in.
2. Verify your mobile number.
3. Upload a picture of yourself.
4. Generate a QR code for digital entry to all MultiSport facilities!
5. Find your sport and the perfect place to stay active!

The app helps you locate all facilities where your MultiSport card can be used.

Explore various sports venues and find your ideal spot to exercise.

A fast, user-friendly and advanced betting app for your mobile and tablet.
With Betano's iOS app for iPhone and iPad, Sports Betting, Slots and Esports are just a tap away! Betano offers exciting features such as SpeedBet, MyLive and many others that will bring your game to a whole new level!

- Sports Betting and Slots
Betano has hundreds of markets available. In addition, you can also enjoy the best slots and table games*. Everything in one place!
*Not applicable to users based in Germany.

- Missions
Betano’s loyalty programme, full of missions and surprises!

- Bonuses
Take part in our missions, complete the challenges and win special bonuses to enjoy the best of sports betting!

- Bet Mentor
The simplest and fastest way to place multiple bets. Bet Mentor provides suggestions on football bets, based on your stake and desired winnings.

- Live Tables*
Blackjack, Roulette, Poker, Baccarat are just a few of the games you can play live.
*Not applicable to users based in the Czech Republic, Germany and Portugal.

- Virtuals*
Can’t get enough of the sports action? Virtual Sports opens up a whole new world of endless betting possibilities 24/7!
*Applicable only to users based in Romania, Bulgaria, Brazil, Peru, Ecuador, Chile, Ontario Province, Nigeria, Buenos Aires Province (Argentina), Mexico and Belgium.

- Share Your Bet
As soon as you place your bet, you can share it with your friends for them to place the same bet with just one tap!

- Smart Notifications
The latest updates on your matches and the settlement of your bets!

- Live Streaming*
Live matches from the top leagues and competitions on your mobile (T&Cs apply)
*Not applicable to users based in Germany and Nigeria.

- Fantasy*
Daily and long-term Fantasy tournaments in top events and leagues on your mobile screen.
*Applicable only to users based in Bulgaria, Nigeria, Czechia, Ontario, Mexico, Buenos Aires Province (Argentina) and Chile.

- Bet Builder/Same Game Parlay
Combine different markets of the same match in a single bet!

Fortuna Sport

Fortuna Sport nabízí nejlepší prostředí, ve kterém si můžeš vsadit, příjemný design, pravidelné aktualizace a obrovský výběr příležitostí!

To vše najdeš ve Fortuna Sport, která se neustále vyvíjí, aby našim klientům poskytla všechny oblíbené funkce:
• Vstupní bonusy
• Pravidelné promoakce s odměnami
• LIVE video přenosy sportovních zápasů na Fortuna TV
• Kompletní nabídka kurzů pro předzápasové i LIVE sázky včetně speciálů
• Typy sázek – SOLO, AKO, Maxikombi, Malá domů, Falc a další
• BetBuilder
• Propracované sportovní statistiky a tabulky
• Předzápasové analýzy
• Inspirace – svět, ve kterém můžeš inspirovat sebe i ostatní a vyhrávat
• Bet Club – škola sázení pro nové hráče
• LIVE vizualizace probíhajících zápasů včetně statistik
• Trvalé přihlášení nebo přihlášení pomocí otisku prstu Touch ID a scanu tváře Face ID
• Dobíjení kreditu pomocí platební karty, Apple Pay nebo Rychlým vkladem
• Možnost cash outu
• Přehled a historie tiketů a transakcí
• Notifikace výsledků vašich tiketů
• Přehledné vyhledávání poboček

Upozornění: Aplikace kontroluje geografickou polohu uživatele z důvodu závazných pravidel obchodu iTunes firmy Apple Inc. pro sázkové aplikace. Pro přihlášení musíte mít zaregistrovaný účet u www.ifortuna.cz a být starší 18 let.

With the EOS platform, you can solve all your club communication, paperwork, and website in one go. The mobile app then makes life easier for the members themselves, their parents and coaches. Say no to chaos in messengers. Communicate with your teams easily.

- notifications, all important information at hand
- communication – clear messages and comments on team walls
- events – calendars, excuse notes, attendance
- payments – QR codes, card payments, proofs of payment
- documents – sharing and submitting
- consents – electronic solution for GDPR

How to add your club to the app? First, your club needs to sign up for the EOS platform (www.eosclub.app). You can then find the club by location and log into it the same way as into the web version. You can also add your club using a QR or numeric code which you can also find in the web version of the platform: click your avatar on the top right > Mobile application.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

Správa klubu digitálně pod jednou střechou. V Klubovém informačnímu systému najdete vše potřebné na jednom místě!

Díky mobilní aplikaci KIS vám neuniknou žádné novinky z klubu, budete mít vše pohromadě, a navíc vás na vše potřebné upozorní notifikace.

Hlavní výhody:

- Notifikace: Upozornění na vše důležité s možností individuálního nastavení pro každého uživatele.
- Hlavní přehled: Komunikace s týmem včetně možnosti anket, widgety s důležitými informacemi.
- Chat: Individuální i skupinová komunikace mezi členy.
- Kalendář a akce: Tréninky, události, zápasy či závody. Informace o všech klubových akcích včetně evidence docházky.
- Platby: Přehled o platbách, možnost stažení QR kódu pro platbu a potvrzení o zaplacení.
- Zdravotní prohlídky: Evidence zdravotních prohlídek s možností odevzdání, kontrola platnosti.
- Dokumenty: Přehled dokumentů či odkazů na webové stránky s možností zobrazení či stažení.
- Souhlasy: Odsouhlasení souhlasů vytvořených klubem, včetně možnosti odvolání.
- Bazar: Možnost nabídnout nevyužívané sportovní vybavení ostatním členům.
- Zdravotní prohlídky: Evidence zdravotních prohlídek s možností odevzdání, kontrola platnosti.

Všechny informace naleznete na webu esports.cz/kis

Teamheadz is an app for easy organisation and communication in sports teams and groups. Suitable for any sport. Managers, leaders or coaches can easily manage their teams directly from their mobile phones. The application can be used in combination with the web platform available at www.teamheadz.com.
 
MULTIPLE TEAMS WITHIN SINGLE ACCOUNT
Sports organisers can create any number of teams and control them from a single account in the application. Likewise, athletes can have all their activities in one place. Regular members can be made into team managers and given the right to create events, invite new members, etc.

TEAM LINE-UP
You can see all team members in one place, including their profile information. The number of team members is not limited. Optional fields can be set for each team, such as the player´s post or jersey number.
Send an invitation to the team easily by e-mail, via SMS or, for example, Whatsapp. New members can either only be invited to the team, or they can be invited directly to participate in existing scheduled events. In a team, you can also restrict the display of some details to its members and increase the feeling of privacy.

SUBGROUPS
You have the option of creating subgroups (for example, A team and B team or field players and goalkeepers) within the list of members and planning events for them separately or setting a separate participation limit for them.
 
TRAININGS AND MATCHES AT A GLANCE
If you are a coach or manager, you can easily plan events and invite players or teammates directly from your mobile.
As a member of the team, you will quickly learn when and where you play or train. You are receiving up-to-date information on whether the event capacity is already full or if the event has been cancelled for some reason. You can save each event to your calendar on your mobile phone.
 
ATTENDANCE
You will confirm your participation in the event within a few seconds. With mobile attendance, team leaders will know in time who they can count on and who is skipping this time and why. You can also assign non-team members to events. If the event is full, the applicant can join the queue and will be informed if the place becomes available. You can easily find out who you can rely on based on the statistics.
 
NOTIFICATION
The notification system speeds up the response to new events in the team. The invitation to the event, created by the captain, will come to everyone on time. Everyone will also learn about the change or cancellation of the event immediately. No one can make excuses for not knowing about something. Choose for yourself whether you want to receive notifications directly to your mobile phone or by e-mail.

NOTICE-BOARD
Write and share important articles, information or instructions for the team. Add files or create a quick poll, so you know what new colour of jerseys the team prefers.

TEAM CHAT AND CHAT FOR EVENTS
You can discuss everything important in one place. Let team members know about new messages with the notification system.
You can use a separate chat for each match or training. You can agree, for example, who takes the car or what the tactics will be.

GALLERY
A gallery is available for each team, in which they simply create albums and upload photos from matches or camps.

WALLET
In the wallet module, you can easily create payment requests for membership fees or for the gym. You will have a clear record of payments and you will see who owes or how much is left in the team wallet.

PARTICIPATION STATISTICS
The application automatically calculates and visualizes the trend of participation in the last 20 events to which the user has been invited. It is possible to distinguish between overall and team-specific statistics.

For the Premium version, also read the Terms of Use for Automatic Subscription Renewal (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

K zakoupení vstupenky do vašeho oblíbeného bazénu, na koupaliště nebo kluziště vám nyní bude stačit jen pár kliknutí. Zároveň budete mít přehled o vašich vstupenkách přímo v mobilu.

S čipovými hodinkami ušetříte 20 % při každém vstupu na sportoviště STAREZ – SPORT. S aplikací si svoje "čipovky" snadno zakoupíte a také budete mít rychlejší přístup do vašeho účtu pro kontrolu výše kreditu.

developer: Shenzhen United Power Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Oficiální aplikace Tipsport extraligy ledního hokeje přináší fanouškům nejdůležitější informace o svém oblíbeném týmu v přehledné formě. Tedy jak a kdy hraje, jakou má formu, na jakém místě v tabulce se nachází, nebo kdo je nejproduktivnějším hráčem týmu. Každý fanda si může vybrat, zda bude chtít sledovat veškeré extraligové dění, nebo zda si v možnostech vybere pouze svůj oblíbený tým. V aplikaci nechybí nejzajímavější články webu hokej.cz, stejně jako super videa důležitých událostí utkání. Ať už se jedná o góly, zákroky, hity nebo bitky. Samozřejmostí je rozpis již odehraných, ale také budoucích zápasů, včetně informací, jaký televizní kanál bude dané utkání vysílat.

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Darts Scorer App Score Counter 2025 is designed for darts lovers.
With this app you can easily count scores while playing X01 and Cricket darts games with your friends. App calculates all points, statistics and automatically determines the winner. In the application you can choose players, the number of Legs and Sets, the game mode and the number of scores 301, 501. It is also possible to save games and play them later. You don't need to buy a special Scoreboard or scorekeeper, everything is available in your phone. Download and track game results with this easy-to-use and free darts calculator.

Lusail Tickets is a secure mobile ticketing application built on top of blockchain technology. Its’ aim is to upgrade security, reduce fraud, and digitalize your tickets purchase processes.
With Lusail Tickets, you can:
- Download your tickets instantly on your smartphone, and keep them with you anywhere you go.
- Transfer tickets to your friends or family members through the ticket transfer option using only their phone numbers. The transfer takes only few seconds.
- Access the event using your digitalized tickets in a frictionless way by just presenting your QR code to the access control point.

Oficiální mobilní aplikace Českého florbalu. Přehledy, programy a výsledky zápasů, statistiky, informace o hráčích týmech i všech soutěžích. To vše na jednom místě.

Po přihlášení přes nové Florbal iD získáte i další rozšířené funkce, mezi které patří především volba oblíbených týmů, hráčů i soutěží.

Zapnutím notifikací vám pak neunikne jediný zápas vašich favoritů ani góly oblíbených hráčů a hráček.

Díky Florbal iD se vaše oblíbené přenesou i do webu Českého florbalu.

YOUR #AbuDhabiGP ESSENTIALS - ALL IN ONE APP! 
The #AbuDhabiGP App is a one-stop-shop guide designed to gear you up for the highly-anticipated Formula 1 Etihad Airways Abu Dhabi Grand Prix 2025. The app will provide you with all you need to plan your race weekend with confidence both on and off the track. Get ready to get Race-Ready! 


Key functionality includes:
• Access your ticket on the app ready to scan on entry to the circuit
• Share tickets with friends and family with ease!
• Browse and explore all the Entertainment areas and add events to favourites
• Receive notifications about on-track & off-track events, including the After-Race concerts
• Check out what other attractions and experiences are included with your ticket
• The #AbuDhabiGP is available in both English and Arabic



You know what to do next–Ready. Set. Download.

HC Dukla Jihlava

Buďte s Duklou v kontaktu – kdykoli a kdekoli!
Oficiální aplikace HC Dukla Jihlava přináší vše, co fanoušek potřebuje – aktuální informace, výsledky, zápasy, vstupenky a mnoho dalšího.

Hlavní funkce aplikace

• Permanentky a vstupenky
Nakupujte a spravujte vstupenky přímo v aplikaci – snadno a přehledně.

• Novinky
Získejte okamžitý přístup ke klubovým zprávám, článkům, rozhovorům a důležitým oznámením. O všem budete vědět jako první.

• Kalendář zápasů
Sledujte kompletní rozpis utkání s informacemi o čase, místě a soupeři. Žádný zápas už vám neuteče.

Buďte součástí dění nejen na stadionu.
S aplikací HC Dukla Jihlava máte klub doslova na dosah ruky!

ROUVY is the indoor cycling app that lets you ride real routes around the world.

Combining sport and technology, ROUVY provides indoor cyclists a realistic and immersive video experience with more than 1,500 augmented-reality bike routes around the world to choose from.

The ROUVY indoor cycling app enables cyclists of all levels to train, have fun and explore the world from the comfort of home. Conquer the Alpe d’Huez in France, ride the Sella Ronda loop in Italy, cruise across the Golden Gate bridge in San Francisco, or train for your next cycling event or triathlon on stunning virtual cycling routes.

ROUVY helps you out in pushing your cycling game even further. It does not matter whether you are a rookie or a seasoned pro - you can choose from a wide selection of routes and indoor cycling workouts.

ROUVY indoor cycling app features:
▶ Enjoy indoor training while riding the world's most iconic bike routes filmed on high-quality video
▶ More than 35,000 km of virtual routes to explore around the world
▶ A wide variety of terrains and gradients
▶ Weekly challenges, special events and group rides
▶ Indoor training plans and indoor cycling workouts designed by pros
▶ Avatar customization
▶ Easy integration with Strava, GARMIN Connect, TrainingPeaks, Wahoo, and many more


A subscription is required to access the full range of features. We offer a free trial so you can experience ROUVY firsthand before committing.

Start your indoor cycling journey today: Download the ROUVY virtual cycling app for free and unlock a world of online cycling training possibilities.

A subscription is required to access the full range of features. We offer a free trial so you can experience indoor training on ROUVY firsthand before committing.

Simple Setup: Create an account, connect your compatible trainer or smart bike via Bluetooth, and follow the on-screen instructions to begin your indoor cycling workout adventure on ROUVY.

The NHL App  dives into the 2025-26 season with a host of exciting new features, including:

– Stats, reimagined. We’ve got League Leaders, no doubt… and a whole lot more. Discover a Stats surface that incorporates EDGE Advanced Stats, Data Visualizations and even some fun facts and new ways of looking at the game. More modules rolling out as the season unfolds.

– Live Activities made its rookie (ok, beta) debut during the playoffs last season; it’s back and now fully-featured. Choose one game, or opt-in for any (or all!) teams so you can set it and forget it!

– How to Watch: There’s more ways than ever to watch a game, and we got you covered with our expanded feature – all the info to know where to stream, tune in or follow along.

– Navigation: We’ve rearranged the furniture a bit to let you jump directly to a Team or Player from our new Search bar, added tab bar-level access to Stats, and the evolution of the latest tab into your Home for all things hockey is underway.  

A refreshed and timely onboarding flow reviews your choices, setting you up to experience all the NHL App has to offer, just the way you like it: breaking news notifications, up-to-the-minute scores and live Gamecenter, new EDGE stats, Game Stories & video highlights, your favorite team’s icon and Goal Horn game alerts & much more.
